sentences.en: Genuine emotion peeps through, only to be squeezed back by some orthodox piety.
sentences.cn: 真实的感情偶尔出现, 但跟着便被正统的虔诚挤跑了.

sentences.en: He challenged the orthodox views on education.
sentences.cn: 他对传统的教育观念提出了质疑。
他的思想非常合乎规范.

sentences.en: In an intellectual way, Syme was venomously orthodox.
sentences.cn: 以知识分子角度来说, 赛姆的正统简直恶毒.

sentences.en: It doesn't sound exactly orthodox, if I may say so.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那听起来不太符合常规。

sentences.en: It was an obvious reaction to the Orthodox strictness of her home.
sentences.cn: 这是对她家里正统犹太教的清规戒律的明显反抗.

sentences.en: Karouzos's poetry shows a profound preoccupation with the Orthodox Church.
sentences.cn: 卡鲁佐斯的诗歌表明他对东正教的执着。

sentences.en: Many of these ideas are now being incorporated into orthodox medical treatment.
sentences.cn: 现在这些理念中有很多正被吸收至正统医学治疗中。

sentences.en: Most orthodox doctors however dismiss this as complete nonsense.
sentences.cn: 但大多数传统的医生认为此说法完全是胡说八道。

sentences.en: Other families have chosen a less orthodox path.
sentences.cn: 而其他家庭则选择不是十分传统的教育.

sentences.en: Payne gained a reputation for sound, if orthodox, views.
sentences.cn: 虽然观点正统，但佩恩合乎情理的见解还是令他为人称道。

sentences.en: Polariscopes for orthodox observations by transmitted light may be classified into two groups.
sentences.cn: 利用透射光进到常规观测的偏振光弹仪,可分为二种.

sentences.en: The former is said to come within the realms of orthodox descriptive cataloguing.
sentences.cn: 前者一般认为属于正统的描述性编目范畴.

sentences.en: The orthodox Thanksgiving dinner includes turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.cn: 传统的感恩节晚餐包括火鸡和南瓜馅饼.
他们是正统的犹太教徒.

sentences.en: This is less true of children brought up in an orthodox faith.
sentences.cn: 在正统信仰中长大成人的儿童,不完全是这样.

phrases.tran_cn: 东正教（是与天主教、新教并立的基督教三大派别之一）

trans.tran_cn: 规范的， 公认的， 普遍赞同的，正统的
trans.tran_en: orthodox ideas, methods, or behaviour are accepted by most people to be correct and right
